org.jnosql.diana.api.column

Interface ColumnDeleteQuery


  • public interface ColumnDeleteQuery
    A unit that has the columnFamily and condition to delete from conditions.

    of(String, ColumnCondition)

    This instance will be used on:

    ColumnFamilyManager.delete(ColumnDeleteQuery)

    ColumnFamilyManagerAsync.delete(ColumnDeleteQuery)

    ColumnFamilyManagerAsync.delete(ColumnDeleteQuery, java.util.function.Consumer)
